sourcesContent:
<template>
  <HomeView v-if="isHomePage" />
  <router-view />
</template>
<script setup>
import { provide, ref } from "vue";
import HomeView from "./views/HomeView.vue";
import { useRoute } from "vue-router";
import { computed } from "vue";
const havetoken = ref(true);
const haveadmintoken = ref(true);
provide("havetoken", havetoken);
provide("haveadmintoken", haveadmintoken);
const route = useRoute();
const isHomePage = computed(() => route.path === "/" || route.path === "/home");
localStorage.setItem("token", "1");
localStorage.setItem("admintoken", "");
</script>
<style>
/* 引入一个图片作为背景，平铺整个面 ，vue模板中*/
body {
  background-image: url("./assets/bg2.jpg");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: cover;
}
</style>
